verses.text: »\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀγγέλῳ|strong="G0032"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w Σάρδεσιν|strong="G4554"\w* \w ἐκκλησίας|strong="G1577"\w* \w γράψον|strong="G1125"\w*· \w Τάδε|strong="G3592"\w* \w λέγει|strong="G3004"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔχων|strong="G2192"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἑπτὰ|strong="G2033"\w*\f + \fr 3:1 \ft επτα \+it rell\+it* ¦ — TR\f* \w πνεύματα|strong="G4151"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἑπτὰ|strong="G2033"\w* \w ἀστέρας|strong="G0792"\w*· ‹\w Οἶδά|strong="G1492"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔργα|strong="G2041"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w*\f + \fr 3:1 \ft οτι \+it rell\+it* ¦ 1 το TR\f* \w ὄνομα|strong="G3686"\w* \w ἔχεις|strong="G2192"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w*\f + \fr 3:1 \ft οτι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,d,e,g,h⅔\+sup* ℵA,C,CP,RP,OC,NU,TR ¦ και \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,f,h⅓,i\+sup* HF\f* \w ζῇς|strong="G2198"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w νεκρὸς|strong="G3498"\w* \w εἶ|strong="G1487"\w*.

\w Γίνου|strong="G1096"\w* \w γρηγορῶν|strong="G1127"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w στήρισον|strong="G4741"\w*\f + \fr 3:2 \ft στηρισον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,f,hpt,ipt\+sup* A,C,RP,OC,NU ¦ στηριξον \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅙,b,d⅓,e\+sup* ℵ,CP,TR ¦ στηριζων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup g\+sup* ¦ τηρησον \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅓,d⅔\+sup* HF (The evidence for στηριζω is overwhelming against τηρεω; the aorist is stronger than the future.)\f* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w λοιπὰ|strong="G3062"\w* \w ἃ|strong="G3739"\w* \w ἔμελλες|strong="G3195"\w* ἀποβαλεῖν,\f + \fr 3:2 \ft εμελλες αποβαλειν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* (CP) ¦ 1 αποβαλλειν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,f,ipt\+sup* RP,HF ¦ ημελλες αποβαλλειν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,e⅓\+sup* ¦ εμελλον αποθανειν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,ept,hpt\+sup* (ℵ)A,C,NU ¦ ημελλεν αποθανειν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup g\+sup* ¦ εμελλον αποθνησκειν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d\+sup* OC ¦ μελλει αποθανειν TR (‘throw’ is supported by \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,e⅓,f,i\+sup* [66%]; ‘die’ is supported by \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,d,ept,g,hpt\+sup* ℵA,C [33%]; ‘throw away’ was possibly thought to be too harsh, but is presumably correct [the verb controls the person: “they die”; “you throw”]. The atticized form of the imperfect, η- [27%], loses to ε- [72%]. The aorist is supported by \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,ept,g,hpt\+sup* ℵA,C; the present is supported by \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,d,ept,f,i\+sup*. Putting it all together, \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* preserves the correct reading.)\f* \w οὐ|strong="G3756"\w* \w γὰρ|strong="G1063"\w* \w εὕρηκά|strong="G2147"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔργα|strong="G2041"\w* \w πεπληρωμένα|strong="G4137"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Θεοῦ|strong="G2316"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w*.\f + \fr 3:2 \ft μου \+it rell\+it* ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e\+sup* TR\f*

\w Μνημόνευε|strong="G3421"\w* \w οὖν|strong="G3767"\w* \w πῶς|strong="G4459"\w* \w εἴληφας|strong="G2983"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἤκουσας|strong="G0191"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τήρει|strong="G5083"\w*\f + \fr 3:3 \ft και ηκουσας και τηρει \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅙,b,d⅓,e,g,h,ipt\+sup* ℵA,C,CP,RP,HF,NU,TR ¦ 124 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d⅔\+sup* ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,f,h¼,ipt\+sup* ¦ 123 τηρεν OC (OC is in small print.)\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w μετανόησον|strong="G3340"\w*· \w ἐὰν|strong="G1437"\w* \w οὖν|strong="G3767"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w γρηγορήσῃς|strong="G1127"\w* \w ἥξω|strong="G2240"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w σὲ|strong="G4771"\w*\f + \fr 3:3 \ft επι σε \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,ept,f,g,hpt,i\+sup* ℵ,CP,RP,HF,OC,TR ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,ept,hpt\+sup* A,C,NU (OC is in small print.)\f* \w ὡς|strong="G5613"\w* \w κλέπτης|strong="G2812"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐ|strong="G3756"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w γνῷς|strong="G1097"\w*\f + \fr 3:3 \ft γνως \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,f,gpt,h⅓,ipt\+sup* A,C,CP,RP,NU,TR ¦ γνωση \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,gpt,h⅔,ipt\+sup* ℵ,HF,OC\f* \w ποίαν|strong="G4169"\w* \w ὥραν|strong="G5610"\w* \w ἥξω|strong="G2240"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w σέ|strong="G4771"\w*.

» ›\w Ἀλλ|strong="G0235"\w*᾿\f + \fr 3:4 \ft αλλ \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,d,ept,f,g,hpt,i\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ αλλα \+bd M\+bd*\+sup hpt\+sup* ℵA,C,OC,NU ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup ept\+sup* TR\f* \w ὀλίγα|strong="G3641"\w* \w ἔχεις|strong="G2192"\w* \w ὀνόματα|strong="G3686"\w*\f + \fr 3:4 \ft ολιγα εχεις ονοματα \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,ept,fpt,g,h⅓,ipt\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ ~ 213 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,ept,h⅔\+sup* (ℵ)A,C,OC,NU ¦ ~ 132 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup fpt,i¼\+sup* ¦ ~ 213 και TR\f* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w Σάρδεσιν|strong="G4554"\w* \w ἃ|strong="G3739"\w* \f + \fr 3:4 \ft α \+it rell\+it* ¦ οι \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,h⅓\+sup*\f* \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w ἐμόλυναν|strong="G3435"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἱμάτια|strong="G2440"\w* \w αὐτῶν|strong="G0846"\w*· \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w περιπατήσουσιν|strong="G4043"\w* \w μετ|strong="G3326"\w*᾿ \w ἐμοῦ|strong="G1473"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w λευκοῖς|strong="G3022"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w ἄξιοί|strong="G0514"\w* \w εἰσιν|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w Ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w νικῶν|strong="G3528"\w* \w οὕτως|strong="G3779"\w*\f + \fr 3:5 \ft ουτως \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅓,hpt,i¼\+sup* ℵ(A)C,OC,NU ¦ ουτος \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅔,b,c⅕,d,e,f,g,hpt,i\+sup* CP,RP,HF,TR (ουτως links ‘white’ in verse 5 to ‘white’ in verse 4—the three ancient versions got it right.)\f* \w περιβαλεῖται|strong="G4016"\w*\f + \fr 3:5 \ft περιβαλειται \+it rell\+it* ¦ περιβαλλειται CP ¦ περιβαλλεται C ¦ περιβαλειτε A\f* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w ἱματίοις|strong="G2440"\w* \w λευκοῖς|strong="G3022"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐ|strong="G3756"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w ἐξαλείψω|strong="G1813"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὄνομα|strong="G3686"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w Βίβλου|strong="G0976"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ζωῆς|strong="G2222"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ὁμολογήσω|strong="G3670"\w*\f + \fr 3:5 \ft ομολογησω \+it rell\+it* ¦ εξομολογησομαι TR [Compare Matthew 10:32.]\f* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὄνομα|strong="G3686"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Πατρός|strong="G3962"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀγγέλων|strong="G0032"\w* \w αὐτοῦ|strong="G0846"\w*.›

»\w Ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔχων|strong="G2192"\w* \w οὖς|strong="G3739"\w* \w ἀκουσάτω|strong="G0191"\w* \w τί|strong="G5101"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Πνεῦμα|strong="G4151"\w* \w λέγει|strong="G3004"\w* \w ταῖς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐκκλησίαις|strong="G1577"\w*. To \nd Philadelphia\nd*

»\w Καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τῷ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀγγέλῳ|strong="G0032"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἐν|strong="G1722"\w* \w Φιλαδελφείᾳ|strong="G5359"\w*\f + \fr 3:7 \ft φιλαδελφεια \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,b⅔,d,e⅗,f⅔,g¼,hpt,i⅓\+sup* CP,RP,HF,OC,NU,TR ¦ φιλαδελφια \+bd M\+bd*\+sup apt,b⅓,d¼,e⅖,f⅓,gpt,hpt,i⅔\+sup* ℵC ¦ φιλαδελφιας \+bd M\+bd*\+sup g¼\+sup* A\f* \w ἐκκλησίας|strong="G1577"\w* \w γράψον|strong="G1125"\w*· \w Τάδε|strong="G3592"\w* \w λέγει|strong="G3004"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἅγιος|strong="G0040"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Ἀληθινός|strong="G0228"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔχων|strong="G2192"\w* \w τὴν|strong="G3588"\w* \w κλεῖν|strong="G2807"\w*\f + \fr 3:7 \ft κλειν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,f,h⅔,i⅔\+sup* CP,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ κλιν ℵA,C ¦ κλειδα \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,g,h⅓,i⅓\+sup* TR\f* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w*\f + \fr 3:7 \ft του \+it rell\+it* ¦ — A,C [+7 mss] NU\f* \w Δαυίδ|strong="G1138"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀνοίγων|strong="G0455"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐδεὶς|strong="G3762"\w* \w κλείσει|strong="G2808"\w*\f + \fr 3:7 \ft κλεισει \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,f(g)h,i\+sup* CP,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ κλισει ℵA,C ¦ κλειει \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e\+sup* TR ¦ κλειων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d\+sup*\f* \w αὐτήν|strong="G0846"\w*, \w εἰ|strong="G1487"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἀνοίγων|strong="G0455"\w*,\f + \fr 3:7 \ft αυτην ει μη ο ανοιγων (+και κλειων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup g\+sup*) \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,fpt,g,h¼,ipt\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ και κλειων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,dpt(pt)e,f¼,hpt\+sup* ℵ,OC,NU ¦ κλειων A ¦ και κλειει \+bd M\+bd*\+sup f¼\+sup* C,TR (We are accustomed to the more balanced form, but the basic point remains the same.)\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐδεὶς|strong="G3762"\w* \w ἀνοίξει|strong="G0457"\w*·\f + \fr 3:7 \ft ανοιξει \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,f,g,h,i\+sup* ℵ,CP,RP,HF,OC ¦ ανοιγει \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e\+sup* A,C,NU,TR ¦ ανοιγων \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d\+sup*\f*

‹\w Οἶδά|strong="G1492"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔργα|strong="G2041"\w*. \w Ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w δέδωκα|strong="G1325"\w* \w ἐνώπιόν|strong="G1799"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w* \w θύραν|strong="G2374"\w* \w ἀνεῳγμένην|strong="G0455"\w*,\f + \fr 3:8 \ft ανεωγμενην \+it rell\+it* ¦ ηνεωγμενην \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,e⅓\+sup* ℵ,NU\f* \w ἣν|strong="G1510"\w*\f + \fr 3:8 \ft ην \+it rell\+it* ¦ και \+bd M\+bd*\+sup ept\+sup* TR\f* \w οὐδεὶς|strong="G3762"\w* \w δύναται|strong="G1410"\w* \w κλεῖσαι|strong="G2808"\w* \w αὐτήν|strong="G0846"\w*· \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w μικρὰν|strong="G3398"\w* \w ἔχεις|strong="G2192"\w* \w δύναμιν|strong="G1411"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἐτήρησάς|strong="G5083"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w λόγον|strong="G3056"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w ἠρνήσω|strong="G0720"\w* \w τὸ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὄνομά|strong="G3686"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w Ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w δίδωμι|strong="G1325"\w*\f + \fr 3:9 \ft διδωμι \+it rell\+it* ¦ διδω A,C,NU ¦ δεδωκα ℵ\f* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w συναγωγῆς|strong="G4864"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w Σατανᾶ|strong="G4567"\w*, \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w λεγόντων|strong="G3004"\w* \w ἑαυτοὺς|strong="G1438"\w* \w Ἰουδαίους|strong="G2453"\w* \w εἶναι|strong="G1510"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w εἰσίν|strong="G1510"\w*, \w ἀλλὰ|strong="G0235"\w* \w ψεύδονται|strong="G5574"\w*—\w ἰδού|strong="G3708"\w*, \w ποιήσω|strong="G4160"\w* \w αὐτοὺς|strong="G0846"\w* \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w ἥξουσιν|strong="G2240"\w*\f + \fr 3:9 \ft ηξουσιν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅙,d⅔,e⅕,f⅖,h⅓\+sup* ℵA,C,CP,OC,NU ¦ ηξωσιν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,c⅖,d⅓,e,f⅗,g,h⅔,i\+sup* RP,HF,TR (One’s first impression is that the three verbs controlled by ινα are parallel and should be in the same mode, namely subjunctive—γνωσιν is home free, προσκυνησωσιν has a heavy majority [including \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup*] but with some dissent; with ηξωσιν the dissent becomes stronger, including ⅗ of Family 35 [a preponderance of the better representatives read the indicative]. The generalized splitting suggests that the ‘norm’ of subjunctive with ινα was at work in the minds of the copyists, the more so since the other two verbs are in that mode; but the indicative isn’t all that infrequent, and in this case presumably emphasizes certainty—they \+bd will\+bd* come.)\f* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w προσκυνήσωσιν|strong="G4352"\w*\f + \fr 3:9 \ft προσκυνησωσιν \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,d⅔,e,f,g,h,i⅔\+sup* CP,RP,HF,TR ¦ προσκυνησουσιν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b⅕,d⅓,e⅕,h¼,i⅓\+sup* ℵA,C,OC,NU\f* \w ἐνώπιον|strong="G1799"\w* \w τῶν|strong="G3588"\w* \w ποδῶν|strong="G4228"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w γνῶσιν|strong="G1108"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w*\f + \fr 3:9 \ft οτι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,f,h¼,i\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ 1 εγω \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,g,h\+sup* ℵA,C,OC,NU,TR\f* \w ἠγάπησά|strong="G0025"\w* \w σε|strong="G4771"\w*.

\w Ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w ἐτήρησας|strong="G5083"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w λόγον|strong="G3056"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὑπομονῆς|strong="G5281"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w*, \w κἀγώ|strong="G2504"\w* \w σε|strong="G4771"\w* \w τηρήσω|strong="G5083"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὥρας|strong="G5610"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w πειρασμοῦ|strong="G3986"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w μελλούσης|strong="G3195"\w* \w ἔρχεσθαι|strong="G2064"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w οἰκουμένης|strong="G3625"\w* \w ὅλης|strong="G3650"\w*, \w πειράσαι|strong="G3985"\w* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w κατοικοῦντας|strong="G2730"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w γῆς|strong="G1093"\w*.

» ›\w Ἔρχομαι|strong="G2064"\w*\f + \fr 3:11 \ft ερχομαι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,d⅓,e,f,g,h,i\+sup* ℵA,C,CP,RP,HF,OC,NU ¦ ιδου 1 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d⅔\+sup* TR\f* \w ταχύ|strong="G5035"\w*. \w Κράτει|strong="G2904"\w* \w ὃ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔχεις|strong="G2192"\w*, \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w μηδεὶς|strong="G3367"\w* \w λάβῃ|strong="G2983"\w* \w τὸν|strong="G3588"\w* \w στέφανόν|strong="G4735"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w*.

‹\w Οἶδά|strong="G1492"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w* \w τὰ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ἔργα|strong="G2041"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w οὔτε|strong="G3777"\w* \w ψυχρὸς|strong="G5593"\w* \w εἶ|strong="G1487"\w* \w οὔτε|strong="G3777"\w* \w ζεστός|strong="G2200"\w*. \w Ὄφελον|strong="G3785"\w* \w ψυχρὸς|strong="G5593"\w* \w ἦς|strong="G3739"\w* \w ἢ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ζεστός|strong="G2200"\w*.\f + \fr 3:15 \ft οφελον ψυχρος ης η ζεστος \+it rell\+it* ¦ 12 ειης 45 TR ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e⅓\+sup* A\f*

\w Οὕτως|strong="G3779"\w*, \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w χλιαρὸς|strong="G5513"\w* \w εἶ|strong="G1487"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐ|strong="G3756"\w*\f + \fr 3:16 \ft ου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e⅓,f,g,hpt,i⅔\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ ουτε \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e⅔,hpt,i⅓\+sup* ℵA,C,OC,NU,TR\f* \w ζεστὸς|strong="G2200"\w* \w οὔτε|strong="G3777"\w* \w ψυχρός|strong="G5593"\w*,\f + \fr 3:16 \ft ζεστος ουτε ψυχρος \+it rell\+it* ¦ ~ 321 A,TR ¦ ζεστρος 23 ει ℵ\f* \w μέλλω|strong="G3195"\w* \w σε|strong="G4771"\w* \w ἐμέσαι|strong="G1692"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w τοῦ|strong="G3588"\w* \w στόματός|strong="G4750"\w* \w μου|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w Ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w λέγεις|strong="G3004"\w*,\f + \fr 3:17 \ft λεγεις \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,d¼,e,gpt,h¼,i⅔\+sup* ℵ,CP,RP,HF ¦ 1 οτι \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b,d,e⅙,f,gpt,h,i⅓\+sup* A,C,OC,NU,TR\f* «\w Πλούσιός|strong="G4145"\w* \w εἰμι|strong="G1510"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w πεπλούτηκα|strong="G4147"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐδενὸς|strong="G3762"\w*\f + \fr 3:17 \ft ουδενος \+it rell\+it* ¦ ουδεν \+bd M\+bd*\+sup e¼\+sup* A,C,NU\f* \w χρείαν|strong="G5532"\w* \w ἔχω|strong="G2192"\w*,» \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w οὐκ|strong="G3756"\w* \w οἶδας|strong="G1492"\w* \w ὅτι|strong="G3754"\w* \w σὺ|strong="G4771"\w* \w εἶ|strong="G1487"\w* \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \w ταλαίπωρος|strong="G5005"\w*—\w καί|strong="G2532"\w*, \w ὁ|strong="G3588"\w* \f + \fr 3:17 \ft ο \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,e¼,f,g,h⅔,ipt\+sup* A,CP,RP,HF,OC ¦ — \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a¼,d,e,h⅓,ipt\+sup* ℵC,NU,TR\f* \w ἐλεεινὸς|strong="G1652"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w πτωχὸς|strong="G4434"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w τυφλὸς|strong="G5185"\w* \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w γυμνός|strong="G1131"\w*—

\w συμβουλεύω|strong="G4823"\w* \w σοι|strong="G4771"\w* \w ἀγοράσαι|strong="G0059"\w* \w χρυσίον|strong="G5553"\w* \w παρ|strong="G3844"\w*᾿ \w ἐμοῦ|strong="G1473"\w*,\f + \fr 3:18 \ft χρυσιον παρ εμου \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,f,g,h⅔,i⅔\+sup* CP,RP,HF ¦ ~ 231 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,h⅓,i⅓\+sup* ℵA,C,OC,NU,TR ¦ 1 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup b\+sup*\f* \w πεπυρωμένον|strong="G4448"\w* \w ἐκ|strong="G1537"\w* \w πυρός|strong="G4442"\w*, \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w πλουτήσῃς|strong="G4147"\w*· \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w ἱμάτια|strong="G2440"\w* \w λευκά|strong="G3022"\w*, \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w περιβάλῃ|strong="G4016"\w*, \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w μὴ|strong="G3361"\w* \w φανερωθῇ|strong="G5319"\w* \w ἡ|strong="G3588"\w* \w αἰσχύνη|strong="G0152"\w* \w τῆς|strong="G3588"\w* \w γυμνότητός|strong="G1132"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w*· \w καὶ|strong="G2532"\w* \w κολλούριον|strong="G2854"\w*\f + \fr 3:18 \ft κολλουριον \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d⅕,e¼\+sup* A(CP)[NU]TR ¦ κουλουριον \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d⅗\+sup* ¦ κολλυριον \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,ept,f,g,h⅔,i\+sup* ℵC,RP,HF,OC (There are at least nine variants, but the only real question is whether to read a single vowel or a diphthong after the double lambda: for the diphthong—\+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a⅕,d,ept,f⅙,h⅓\+sup* A; for the vowel—\+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,ept,f,g,h⅔,i\+sup* ℵC.)\f* \w ἔγχρισον|strong="G1472"\w* \w ἐπὶ|strong="G1909"\w*\f + \fr 3:18 \ft εγχρισον επι \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup* CP ¦ 1 \+bd M\+bd*\+sup ept\+sup* TR ¦ ινα εγχριση \+bd M\+bd*\+sup a,b,f,ipt\+sup* RP,HF,OC ¦ ινα εγχρισαι A,C ¦ εγχρισαι \+bd M\+bd*\+sup gpt\+sup* (ℵ)NU (There are over 25 variants; \+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,ept,gpt,h,ipt\+sup* are badly splintered; but \+bd f\+bd*\+sup 35\+sup*\+bd M\+bd*\+sup d,e,g,h\+sup* agree in omitting ινα, which takes the subjunctive with it, which leaves the imperative in control.)\f* \w τοὺς|strong="G3588"\w* \w ὀφθαλμούς|strong="G3788"\w* \w σου|strong="G4771"\w*, \w ἵνα|strong="G2443"\w* \w βλέπῃς|strong="G0991"\w*.
